item.title: 特朗普经济的三个 "A"：人工智能、资产价格和富裕阶层
item.description: 人工智能、富裕消费者和资产价格上涨支撑着特朗普的经济【原文：Trump’s economy is being propped up by AI, affluent consumers and asset price gains】

item.title: Instacart 在食品杂货订单节节攀升后前景看好
item.description: Instacart 公布的订单增长好于预期，并对当期盈利作出乐观展望，表明其核心杂货配送服务的需求一直保持强劲。【原文：Instacart posted better-than-expected order growth and provided an upbeat earnings outlook for the current period, indicating that demand for its core grocery delivery service has been holding strong.】

item.title: 使用聊天机器人的妄想症患者有自己的语言
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，埃伦-休特（Ellen Huet）和雷切尔-梅兹（Rachel Metz）将报道他们对人们在广泛使用聊天机器人期间出现错觉的报道进行调查后的发现。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ellen Huet and Rachel Metz report on their findings after an investigation into reports of people suffering from delusions during their extensive use of chatbots.】

item.title: 摩根大通的一通电话引发了三色集团的疯狂终结
item.description: 丹尼尔-朱（Daniel Chu）在意大利时，手机突然响了起来，这与他赖以发家致富的德克萨斯州闷热的停车场大相径庭。【原文：Daniel Chu was in Italy, a world away from the sweltering Texas car lots he had built his fortune on, when his phone lit up.】

item.title: 洛克希德和 Luckey 支持的核电初创公司融资 1.3 亿美元
item.description: Anduril Industries Inc.公司创始人帕尔默-卢基（Palmer Luckey）、洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin Corp.）、帕兰提尔科技公司（Palantir Technology Inc.【原文：Anduril Industries Inc. founder Palmer Luckey, Lockheed Martin Corp., Palantir Technology Inc.’s Shyam Sankar and other investors are putting $130 million into Valar Atomics, a nuclear startup that’s aiming to build thousands of advanced nuclear fission reactors within a decade.】

item.title: 菲尔-米克尔森炒作石油钻探商，为近海项目造势
item.description: 美国石油业目前最引人关注的企业大戏之一不是在二叠纪盆地或阿拉斯加的北坡上演，而是在加利福尼亚州的圣巴巴拉这个不可能的背景下上演，而且还有一位著名的职业高尔夫球手客串演出。【原文：One of the most compelling corporate dramas in the US oil industry right now isn’t playing out in the Permian Basin or Alaska’s North Slope but against the unlikely backdrop of tony Santa Barbara, California — with a walk-on part from a famous professional golfer.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税似乎已达到其经济和政治顶峰
item.description: 特朗普向最高法院提交的关税案看起来摇摆不定，民主党人正在打 "经济承受能力 "牌对付他【原文：Trump’s tariff case before the Supreme Court looks wobbly, and Democrats are playing the ‘affordability’ card against him】

item.title: 埃及加大黑海小麦采购力度
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，埃及新成立的小麦采购机构已从黑海地区预订了约 50 万吨小麦，将于 12 月和 1 月进口。【原文：Egypt’s new wheat-buying agency has booked about half a million tons of the grain from the Black Sea region for import in December and January, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 乌克兰银行欺诈案败诉后，大亨们必须支付 30 亿美元
item.description: 两名乌克兰前亿万富翁被伦敦一名法官判令支付 30 多亿美元，因为他们被认定对国有贷款机构 Privatbank PJSC 损失数十亿美元的欺诈行为负有责任。【原文：Two former Ukrainian billionaires were ordered to pay more than $3 billion by a London judge after they were found liable for a fraud that cost the state-owned lender Privatbank PJSC billions of dollars.】

item.title: 股票大年，债券面临数据洪流考验
item.description:
随着政府准备重新启动经济报告机制，S&P 500指数创纪录的涨势岌岌可危。【原文：

The S&P 500’s record-setting rally is at stake as the government gets ready to fire back up its economic reporting machinery.

item.title: 尽管印度出口计划迫在眉睫，原糖仍收复失地
item.description: 纽约原糖期货周一小幅上涨，收复了最近几周的部分跌幅，尽管市场对全球供应可能过剩的担忧与日俱增。【原文：Raw sugar futures in New York rose slightly on Monday, recovering some of the losses from recent weeks despite growing concerns about a potential global supply glut.】

item.title: 奥地利顶级权力经纪人辞去央行职务
item.description: 奥地利联邦经济商会会长、该国最有影响力的公众人物之一哈拉尔德-马勒尔（Harald Mahrer）在其商业游说团因工资问题引起强烈抗议后辞去了中央银行的职务。【原文：Harald Mahrer, president of the Austrian Federal Economic Chambers and one of the nation’s most influential public figures, quit his central-bank post after an outcry over salaries at his business lobby.】

item.title: 巴里克在金价飙升之际向投资者返还更多资金
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp. ）在黄金破纪录上涨后，提高了季度股息，并扩大了股票回购计划。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. boosted its quarterly dividend and expanded a share buyback program after gold’s record-breaking rally.】

item.title: Grab 向远程驾驶汽车初创公司 Vay 投资 6000 万美元
item.description: 东南亚最大的叫车服务提供商 Grab 控股有限公司正在向远程驾驶服务 Vay 投资 6000 万美元，以增加其在无人驾驶汽车技术方面的赌注。【原文：Grab Holdings Ltd., Southeast Asia’s largest ride-hailing provider, is investing $60 million in remote-driving service Vay to add to its bets in technologies for driverless vehicles.】

item.title: 日本政府希望通过一揽子刺激计划启动增长计划
item.description: 日本首相高市真奈希望利用她的首个经济刺激计划来启动经济，并通过投资关键产业来启动新的增长战略。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi aims to use her first stimulus package to jump-start the economy and initiate a new growth strategy through investment in key industries.】

item.title: 匈牙利赢得美国对俄制裁豁免后摩尔上升
item.description: 在匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）获得美国对俄罗斯石油制裁的豁免后，匈牙利炼油厂 Mol Nyrt.的股价上涨。【原文：Shares of Hungarian refiner Mol Nyrt. rose after Prime Minister Viktor Orban secured an exemption from US sanctions on Russian oil — which is key to the company’s operations.】

item.title: 性、权力和性高潮冥想崇拜的衰落
item.description:
OneTaste的前领导人曾是妇女赋权的先锋，但艾伦-休特（Ellen Huet）的著作《性高潮帝国》（Empire of Orgasm）节选展示了她们是如何成为被定罪的重罪犯的，而这些重罪犯不会介意特朗普的赦免。【原文：

OneTaste’s former leaders were once the seeming vanguard of women’s empowerment, but an excerpt from Ellen Huet’s book Empire of Orgasm shows how they became convicted felons who wouldn’t mind a Trump pardon.

】

item.title: 微软寄希望于艾利克斯-厄尔这样的 "影响者 "来缩小与 ChatGPT 的差距
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）急于提高其 Copilot 聊天机器人的下载量，因此招募了一些美国最受欢迎的有影响力的人，向年轻消费者传递一个信息，这个信息可以概括为："我们的人工智能助手和 ChatGPT 一样酷：我们的人工智能助手和 ChatGPT 一样酷。【原文：Microsoft Corp., eager to boost downloads of its Copilot chatbot, has recruited some of the most popular influencers in America to push a message to young consumers that might be summed up as: Our AI assistant is as cool as ChatGPT.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Man Group 在获得 130 亿美元委托后欢呼新时代的到来
item.description: 全球最大的上市对冲基金管理公司 Man Group Plc 正在见证客户流量的增长，因为欧洲的一些机构投资者根据可持续发展标准重新分配委托。【原文：Man Group Plc, the world’s largest publicly traded hedge-fund manager, is seeing growth in client flows as a number of institutional investors in Europe reassign mandates based on sustainability criteria.】

item.title: 特种燃料库存激增改写石油市场格局
item.description: 在燃料市场的一个小角落里，不断膨胀的库存加剧了全球石油供过于求的局面，并使基准原油价格的前景变得更加复杂。【原文：Ballooning inventories in a niche corner of the fuel market are compounding the global oversupply of oil and complicating the outlook for benchmark crude prices.】

item.title: 智利大选交易者指南
item.description: 投资者对智利政治向右转已基本作出了定价，但交易员和分析师认为，如果这一有利于市场的转变在周日的大选中得到巩固，智利将进一步走强。【原文：Investors have largely priced in a political swing to the right in Chile, yet traders and analysts see further gains if that market-friendly shift is consolidated in Sunday’s general elections.】

item.title: 人工智能贸易出现裂痕，CoreWeave 面临盈利压力
item.description: 在经历了上周的大跌之后，现在是提出人工智能支出问题的艰难时刻。但这正是 CoreWeave Inc.【原文：After last week’s selloff, this is a tough time to be raising the issue of spending on artificial intelligence. But that’s precisely what CoreWeave Inc.’s quarterly results after the bell Monday are about to do.】

item.title: KKR 将以每股 1,710 日元的价格对 Forum Engineering 发起要约收购
item.description: KKR & Co. 将以每股 1,710 日元的价格收购日本 Forum Engineering Inc.【原文：KKR & Co. is launching an offer for Japan’s Forum Engineering Inc. at ¥1,710 per share.】

item.title: 保柏金融公司通过次级交易加入风险债务复兴行列
item.description: 保柏金融公司（Bupa Finance Plc）正在筹划自 2021 年以来的首笔次级债交易，试图通过回购未来几年到期的票据来重新调整其债务结构。【原文：Bupa Finance Plc is lining up its first subordinated debt deal since 2021 as it seeks to re-jig its debt profile by buying back notes due in the next couple of years.】

item.title: 德意志银行即将与欧洲投资基金达成 SRT 交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）即将与欧洲投资基金（European Investment Fund）完成一项重大的风险转移交易。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is close to completing a significant risk transfer deal with the European Investment Fund, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 股市大跌让盈利增长成为最强劲的牛市支柱
item.description: 美股动荡的一周动摇了牛市的根基。人工智能支出突然显得挥霍无度。裁员潮削弱了人们对就业市场的信心。低端消费者开始屈服。【原文：A turbulent week for US stocks has shaken the bull case to its foundation. Artificial intelligence spending suddenly looks profligate. A wave of layoffs eroded confidence in the job market. The low-end consumer is starting to buckle.】

item.title: 巴克莱出售 2014 年以来首批欧元 AT1，风险情绪有所改善
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）正抓住风险情绪改善的机会，出售其自 2014 年以来的首笔欧元货币附加一级债务。【原文：Barclays Plc is seizing on an improvement in risk sentiment to sell its first euro currency Additional Tier 1 debt since 2014.】

item.title: 中国汽车销量下降，补贴政策终止影响需求
item.description: 由于地方政府逐步取消以旧换新计划，加上需求持续低迷，中国 10 月份乘用车销量出现一年多来的首次下滑。【原文：China’s passenger car sales dropped in October for the first time in more than a year as the gradual phasing out of local government trade-in programs add to ongoing headwinds that are hurting demand.】

item.title: Nvidia 家乡的数据中心空置等待供电
item.description:
加利福尼亚州圣克拉拉市两处设施的命运凸显了美国科技行业乃至整个经济面临的重大挑战。【原文：

The fate of two facilities in Santa Clara, California, highlights a major challenge for the US tech sector and indeed the wider economy.

】

item.title: 美国港口在假日冷清和关税困境中面临 "货物衰退
item.description: 新数据显示，由于关税的不确定性给货主带来压力，且消费者支出前景依然阴云密布，预计美国的进口量将在年底假期和2026年放缓。【原文：US import volumes are projected to slow through the year-end holidays and into 2026, as tariff uncertainty weighs on cargo owners and the outlook for consumer spending remains clouded, new data show.】
